Description: At the end of a private way, this gorgeous 2-bedroom unit spans the top two floors of a lead-safe row home. Apartment features hardwood flooring and lots of natural lighting throughout. Fully-applianced galley kitchen opening up to a massive living room with dining area. Two spacious bedrooms with ample closet space and modern, skylit bathroom on the top floor. Garage parking and free laundry and storage space in basement. Located in the south end of Cambridgeport, just a few blocks from the Charles River. Less than a mile from Central Square, with easy access to the Red Line and Memorial Drive.
